column5: Flying into Meta Lake Lodge on the 18th. Has anybody been up there yet this year. This will be our 3rd time there, and will also spend a few days over in Ara. All info is greatly appreciated. Tim
We go in August...this will be my third year there too! I've never gone up this early, so I can't help you...sorry! Good luck, and have a great trip!
One last request to see if anybody has fished Meta/Ara this year. Flying in Sat. morning. Tim
These pics were on Meta's Facebook page....are one of these two guys, you?
Brace Lake fishes those boats. Didn't see them at Meta camps but could have them. Maybe you can post a report when you return and see if you found the same spots we did in Meta.
The boats pictured are Meta Lake Lodge's boats.

Yeah, the outposts had the silver boats but there sure was alot of the wood boats on Meta. I'm sure they did pretty well, they were biting on many of spots all over the lake. Saw them going into Ara too but did not get a report from there.
